LanguageData.MinchoWitch_PotionHigh.stages.0.label: minchowitch's potion cool
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_PotionHigh.stages.1.label: ignoring the Minchowitch's warning
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_PotionHigh.stages.1.descript: she told me to drink it once a day, but... What's the big deal?
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_PotionHigh_MinchoWitchOnly.s: That ambrosia makes me feel more relaxed, and gives me energy at the same time.
drink potions as much as one likes
Poor people. It's a privilege of me and the Mincho to drink this potion as much as likes.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_PotionHigh_MinchoOnly.stages: That ambrosia makes me feel more relaxed, and gives me energy at the same time.
drink potions as much as one likes
I drank the potion that the witch made me several times, but I shouldn't give it to humans many times. Why?
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.0.label: My stomach is hurt
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.0.descrip: My stomach is a little cold.
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.1.label: I've got a headache
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.1.descrip: My head is cold and I'm about to break...
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.2.label: My body smells like mint
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.2.descrip: I smell something fresh in my body. This is not my smell...
LanguageData.Mincho_InfectionThought.stages.3.label: No no no no
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.0.label: no Mincho
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.0.descripti: There's no Mincho in here. But it's not problem, if it's not there, I just make it.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.1.label: serve to Mincho
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.1.descripti: Your Freshness, I swear to rule you as a master and serve you as a servant at the same time.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.2.label: supreme happiness
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.2.descripti: I'm so happy that there are so many Mincho.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.3.label: rule and serve
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.3.descripti: It's good to rule the Minchos, but it's also very happy to be ruled by them.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.4.label: oblivion of hatred
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_RaceRatio.stages.4.descripti: I don't care the days when I was experimented by the Empire any more. I just want to live here with the Minchos forever.
LanguageData.Mincho_RaceRatio.stages.0.label: opinions on the Minchowitch
LanguageData.Mincho_RaceRatio.stages.0.description: I'm so glad she does many things for us, but sometimes... I think she is going too far. Such as transforms other race into my kind. I'm happy to have more of my kind, but play with other race make me more happy and... excited.
LanguageData.MinchoWitch_MintchocoBiofilmThought.stag: It's a bit heavy, but it has a very refreshing scent. And... Hawn...
